thread.title: Ex-France striker Djibril Cisse questioned, released in blackmail case
thread.title_full: Ex-France striker Djibril Cisse questioned, released in blackmail case

title: Ex-France striker Djibril Cisse questioned, released in blackmail case
text: • France international released by police after being questioned • Three others placed in custody over an extortion plot The former France and Liverpool... guardian.co.uk 34 minutes ago - Sports BBC Local News: London -- Former QPR and France striker Djibril Cisse is held by police as part of a sex tape extortion investigation. BBC Local News 1 hour ago - UK PARIS - Former Liverpool and France striker Djibril Cisse and three other people were arrested Tuesday in a blackmail investigation that allegedly involves a sex... Bangkok Post 4 hours ago - World French police arrested former Liverpool striker Djibril Cisse and three other people on Tuesday over a suspected attempt to blackmail France soccer international... SuperSport 7 hours ago - Sports Former France striker Djibril Cisse has been arrested as part of an investigation into a blackmail case. FOX Sports 8 hours ago - Sports
